That he needs to attend a meeting of the academic committee

question.explain-text: In the conversation, the advisor says well, the academic committee met last week to discuss which students should be admitted to the Honors Program, and,…guess what…you were selected, and the student responds I didn't even know I was being considered! From this, it can be determined that the advisor wants to tell the student that he has been admitted to a special program. The third answer is therefore the best answer to this question.
